- [ ] Test Windows Build
- [ ] Test Windows Unit Tests
- [ ] Check Windows Warnings
- [ ] Check Linux Build
- [ ] Check Linux Unit Tests
- [ ] Check Linux Warnings
- [ ] Update version number in CMake
- [ ] Update test consumer
- [ ] Update User Manual
- [ ] Update Consumer Template 
- [ ] Update VCPKG
